These changes re­ sulted from the conclusion that a high-pressure nitrogen tank failure caused the loss of Syncom I. Based on Syncom II experience, several modifications were also made to Syncom III. N-on-P solar cells with 0.30 mm (12-mil) fuzed silica covers replaced the more radiation sensitive P-on-N solar cells with their 0.15 mm (6-mUl) glass covers.
